Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Barely noticing the autoweapons, Megatron X continued searching for two things.  Rodims.  Hydras.  In seperate locations.  No matter.  He transmitted Romus' location to the Autobots then scowled.  he stowed hi beam saber to take on his fusion cannon, stand with his back to the corridor wall, and fire two high power blasts down eac end, melting the guns' targeting and other suseptible ardware, and blasting out two walls.  He heard and detected other weaponfire, but it did not interest him at all.  Hydras was what he wanted.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>He looked up, then blasted out the ceiling, and began to slowly ascend, ignorin other weapons and things such as lifts to get to Hydras.  Leaving the other outbursts of violence behind and below him, he acendd toward Hydras, entertaining ideas on how best to dismember and slowly kill this cur in Decepticon clothing.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 11/28/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: A Spark of Hope<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Friday, November 28, 2008, 1:55 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv404295815>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV><BR>> Hydras slamed against a wall and with a comlink he said to <BR>Cyc "What <BR>> are you looking for?"<BR><BR>"What am I looking for?" Cyclonus spoke as he paused as he came to <BR>fork in the hall. His voice is calm as he manuvered swiftly. <BR><BR>"I am looking for Galvatron! I would even settle for Megatron. I am <BR>looking for the true leader of the warriors of Cybertron!" <BR><BR>A quick thrust of power from Cyclonus sent twin balls of fire that <BR>took out the autoguns that defended one the halls, even as Scourge <BR>did the same for the other. <BR><BR>"I had thought for a moment that was you, but now I am not so sure."<BR><BR>With his knowledge gained from the Rodimus Download Cyclonus quickly <BR>shifted direction and continued onward, moving inexorably toward the <BR>top of the Black tower. <BR><BR>((OOC: I am not sure where Megatron X is in the tower, so I will <BR>leave it up to him weather Cyclonus & Scourge run into him
 during <BR>this long chase.))<BR><BR>Preston<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
